divs: Sighting DetailsI was playing in the garden with my brother when he suddenly began to stare at the sky, when I do the same woahh ���NO MAMES QU��� ES ESO! I exclaimed. At first, I thought that things were many planes flying together, but no! it was a triangle, a very large triangle (like 20m^2). It was like floating but it doesn't move very much. I was amazed, that triangle stayed like one hour only floating, I stared and stared and my brother said me that he was scared, so I hugged him and said him that all will go well. Suddenly that enormous triangle dissapeared.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Mexico
There were no other sightings in Mexico on or around May 22nd 2011
Summary: Like a triangle of yellow lights.
